metadata.Title: CVE-2023-4693 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An out-of-bounds read flaw was found on grub2's NTFS filesystem driver.This issue may allow a physically present attacker to present a speciallycrafted NTFS file system image to read arbitrary memory locations. Asuccessful attack allows sensitive data cached in memory or EFI variablevalues to be leaked, presenting a high Confidentiality risk.

criterions.comment: grub2 package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
grub2-unsigned package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
grub2-signed package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
